content: Blood of the Iron Bull is one of the rarest and most important Crafting Materials in Black Myth: Wukong. They are vital for upgrading all your Spirits and powering them up to their maximum level. Blood of the Iron Bull can be found throughout the game in various locations, so you will always be stumbling upon them while defeating Yaoguai Kings, Chiefs, and bosses.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Blood_of_the_Iron_Bull.md", under the primary heading "Blood of the Iron Bull". The content is presented below:

Blood of the Iron Bull is one of the rarest and most important Crafting Materials in Black Myth: Wukong. They are vital for upgrading all your Spirits and powering them up to their maximum level. Blood of the Iron Bull can be found throughout the game in various locations, so you will always be stumbling upon them while defeating Yaoguai Kings, Chiefs, and bosses.
